article.title: Javelin Joint Venture Awarded $115 Million Contract for United Arab Emirates and Oman
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Raytheon Company and Lockheed Martin's Javelin Joint Venture has received a $115 million contract with the U.S. government to product the Javelin anti-tank missile and command launch unit for the United Arab Emirates and Oman. Javelin is a man-portable and employable fire-and-forget medium-range missile system ideal for one-soldier operations in all environments.
